attributes.action: Abolish special rules for MPs and ministers regarding bugging by security services or police.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Politicians are allowed far too much freedom and should be held far more accountable to the public who pay for them. If I were to visit a person in prison who was being held for extradition on alleged terrorist offences, I would be insisting that the interview was taped for my own sake. Do MPs visit all the constituants that are in prison or just particular ones ? We need far more open government. Politicians should account properly for every penny they receive just as people in the REAL world have to.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
